DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to study the management of the sprained ankle by help of NSAID-plaster. A questionnaire. The effect of RICE and RICE + NSAID-plaster in the treatment of the sprained ankle, compared by pain-score.
DOC.brief_title: Management of the Sprained Ankle by Help of NSAID-Plaster
DOC.criteria: A sprained ankle, less than 24 hours old, understanding Danish, 18 years or older Fracture of the ankle, wound around the ankle, allergy of NSAID pregnancy, daily use of NSAID, GIbleeding
